attributes.review: This app is atrocious! I feel that it is trying to skew me to be a terrible racist fascist like our dumbass President! This app is a disgrace and should be removed IMMEDIATELY I AM FURIOUS AND WOULD LIKE TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: so i got this app and when i opened it i saw a orange oompa loompa and i was shooketh to the core that my eyes came bulging out of my head and when i put them back in i decided to keep going and i went brain dead from all the oompa loompa supporters and my friends had to take me to the hospital. and as soon as i woke up and i looked at the app i realized it was the president and i went brain dead.again.vote him out he’s causing people to die 👺
attributes.title: 💀 i almost passed away 💀

👸🏽👸🏾👸🏿🤴🏽🤴🏾🤴🏿 👸🏽👸🏾👸🏿🤴🏽🤴🏾🤴🏿 👸🏽👸🏾👸🏿.  Four years ago, what is now known as the Black Lives Matter Global Network began to organize. It started out as a chapter-based, member-led organization whose mission was to build local power and to intervene when violence was inflicted on Black communities by the state and vigilantes.
In the years since, we’ve committed to struggling together and to imagining and creating a world free of anti-Blackness, where every Black person has the social, economic, and political power to thrive.
